website_summaries.verdict: This pill form of Garcinia Cambogia has a high portion of natural HCA at a low price.
pros: Comes at a price point that makes the supplement affordable to try
Some people feel it helps with mood
cons: Occasional complaints that powder leaks from the capsules

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and have lost 50 lbs so far. it is a great product and I couldn't have done it without it! I'm going to keep taking it so I can lose the last 40 lbs---can't wait to see the final result based on the great results so far
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline todd

customer_reviews.title: I've lost over a hundred
customer_reviews.text: This product is phenomenal! I have lost 114 lb and 16 months. I used to weigh 300 pounds, now I'm 186! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Black fat, reduces weight and takes of inches
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fat blocker and inch reducer I have found. It quickly reduced me one pants size and I haven't gained it back I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: grandpa bob

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: This works WONDERS for appetite suppression. I take two in the morning with a full bottle of water. Works all day. No side effects that I've noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Helly

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: This is the same thing that sells for $69 a bottle from another manufacturer. I've been taking this in conjunction with apple cider vinegar and, I'm amazed it works. I usually don't try stuff like this because, it's usually more expensive that I think it's worth but, at this price, I was willing to take the chance. I'm going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Spilled powder
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I didn't notice any difference in my weight but did notice a difference in my appetite when taken as directed which is a pro. However, I had quite a few capsules that were only half full, and plenty of powder spilled at the bottom. I'll look elswhere for better packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product . I lost almost 20lbs in 2 months . Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Myriah

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works and is safe and NO you dont need to exercise but exercise is always goid if you have time
customer_reviews.text: I love that it actually works. I have chronic back pain so exercise programs are not an option. I gained 42 pounds from taking Lyerica and could not loose the weight. I tried Garcinia Cambogia and I have lost 30 pounds in 3 months. Amazed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Helped me break through my weight plateau
customer_reviews.text: I started working on losing weight after my last annual physical. I ate healthier and continued my workouts. After 3 months I had lost 10 pounds but then it stalled for 2 months. I did some research and came upon Garcinia Cambogia. The reviews, combined with my research, said this was the product to try. I've been using it for one week so far and I'm through the plateau and down 3 pounds. It really does work. No side effects at all. I feel re-energized to keep losing weight. I will continue to use this product and would recommend it to anyone looking to be healthier and lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: J Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: This product DOES ABSOLUTELY NOTHING! I am on a strict macros diet consisting losing 2 sometimes 3 pounds a week for the last 6 weeks. I gave this product a try to see if it would boost my weight loss. It did the opposite. I noticed my weight loss stalled and I was holding on to water. I Actually GAINED 3 pounds on this. I’ve been on it for 12 days. ENOUGH. I will not give this another chance. I regret purchasing it. Who knows what’s really in this powder. It’s money down the drain. I’m sorry. There are a lot of fake reviews on here! Mine is real.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! I only take one a day and I feel a big difference in my hunger and in my mood. I’ll admit I’ve taken this as a mood booster a few times. I have it 4 stars because I’m now on my 2nd bottle over 6 months (I don’t take it daily) and I can see that the effects subside if I take it daily. The best results are when I take it now and again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Best Product and Value Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product it really does work. I personally lost 30 lbs by using this and i take 1 pill about 30 mins before meals, if its going to be a food day like thanksgiving i take 2 30 mins prior to eating. You must excersies to get accurate results. this is my favorite product i will never use a different one. I personally Highly recommend this product to anyone looking to curve their appetite and wants to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Garcinia Cambogia 95% HCA
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this Garcinia Cambogia from Opti Natural in December of 2017. At that time I weighed 207 lbs. As of March 2019 I weigh 188 lbs. A weight loss of 19 lbs. My goal is to reach 175 lbs. I contribute this weight loss to this Garcinia Cambogia and moderate exercise. It has controlled my appetite and desire to overeat without the jitters and side effects. I will continue using this because it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom USA

customer_reviews.title: Best Brand
customer_reviews.text: By far the best brand and superior ingredients that I found. It definitely does what it says. I found that my appetite was definitely suppressed and my metabolism was boosted. Just continue your regular routine and see results within approximately 1 1/2 weeks. Also implemented their other product Forskolin which complements a great and safe way to lose unwanted belly fat.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: They work grewt
customer_reviews.text: I love Garcinia Cambogia bc it truly curved my appetite and gave me energy. It takes almost 2 weeks, for me to notice the difference but you still have to be mindful of what your putting in your body as well, but overall these pills are great and I hope this review helps someone
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Williams

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend 😱
customer_reviews.text: I feel product has extended my hunger periodically, it depends on how late I finish eating at night.. I’m going to give them a few weeks try and will return with my outcome..I am alittle over my first month of use, so we will see. Weeks later: Feel pills are not curbing my appetite at all. I have been taking them for over a month conservatively and even double my morning dose once or twice.. I’m still hungry and may have even gained a few pounds😡 I do not recommend.. sorry.. waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: dia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It seems like my appetite increased while taking the pills. I was always hungry, and while I didn't gain weight, I didn't loose any either. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hessler

customer_reviews.title: No Side Effects and More Energy
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for just under a week. While I will return to give you an update after a month has completed, I would like to let you know all of the pros I have noticed since taking this product: Pros: I have not had any side effects so far. Also, my energy has increased and I have more stamina. My bowel movements have become more regular, and I am not craving sweets all of the time. I feel my appetite has supressed. Overall, I am happy with this product. I will update my review once I have used this product for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: nisuelli

customer_reviews.title: Gained Weight
customer_reviews.text: If you're used to the good stuff like phentermine, this is NOT for you. Occasionally made my heart race, but did nothing for my appetite or weight loss. I managed to gain 4 lbs in two weeks. Also my period was extremely heavy and it never is, so I don't know if it's a coincidence or what. Either way, would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: gypsyhouse

customer_reviews.title: garcinia really works
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these pills do work. they curb my appetite better than anything I have used before. I have lost about 20 pounds with my last bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not as effective as counterparts
customer_reviews.text: I love the gardenia Cambogia plant extract and I usually always bought the same brand. I tried this one because it was slightly cheaper than my go-to. Unfortunately, I did not see the same results that I had with my other brand. I am not sure if this one just takes longer to work, but I finished the entire bottle while working out and did not have quick results. Comparatively, on the other brand Ive been taking for about two weeks and I have lost two pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Keanna Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buzz
customer_reviews.text: Like many of the other users I can say with certainty that since taking this product I have gotten a surprising amount of high energy. I think the best part for me is my appetite being supressed and not having the urge to constantly snack. In fact snacking doesn't even appeal to me as much as it did before. I find myself having one fairly large meal for the day and I am full all day long. As far as weight loss cant really say but will update review once I know..A must have product for suppressing the appetite and for an outburst of energy...HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: I'll Keep Using It
customer_reviews.text: I like to think this product is helping me block carbs. Like with anything, healthy diet and exercise are going to make the big difference, but this seems to be a good supplement to incorporate in my program. Will get another bottle - but this isn't a drastic weight-loss miracle product. It's an addition to a healthy, balanced lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine to take with my high blood pressure Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Down 15 pounds in 2 1/2 months. What I like about these pills is that u don’t gain the weight back. I can’t take weight loss pills due caffeine it makes my heart beat so fast it’s scary to take them. This is the only weight loss supplement I ever been able to take. What’s extra crazy I can actually take 2. I’m just shocked! I do have high blood pressure that’s under control and these don’t effect me negativity in any kind of wAy. I take 2 at a time. If I take 1 at different times it does make me jittery, but if i take them both at once I’m fine..
customer_reviews.author: MALIBUGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Good Appetite Suppressant
customer_reviews.text: I have a desk job that is stressful and its easy to snack. So I decided to try this product, Ive been taking it for years and it really does work. Love this, I take one each morning and gives me sustainable energy throughout the day and suppresses my appetite throughout my work day and keeps me regular. I would highly recommend. Will keep on taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: sb1532

customer_reviews.title: Diet and exercise and use it everydayon't see results by just using it a few days!! Keep it up guys
customer_reviews.text: I'm already on my second bottle of the product and I lost 35 lbs in 2 months and it helps me suppress my hunger gives more energy very happy with it. I'm diabetic and even my numbers been steady 100 below fasting and my pressure from 95-110. Of course diet and exercise too but as far as keeping my weight this helps!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Avila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: When I first got them I swallowed them whole. They seemed to be helping but after the first bottle I started chewing them. I really noticed a difference then. The taste was horrible and it made sugar taste really bad. Now that I said that I'm wondering if they tasted horrible because I was on a sugar binge and had just had sugar. When I take them I also noticed it curbs my eating binge, you know, the kind you get when your discouraged and don't care and just trying to find something satisfying but your not really hungry? I feel satisfied and can do other things wholeheartedly. They've helped me more than anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Rae Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: Started these July 16 2020 lost weight
customer_reviews.text: I just started these on July 16 2020 when I started I was 119... its now the 18 and im now 117 !!!!!!!! This is crazy i haven't changed anything i haven't been exercising im so exited to see how much ill loose when I combine a healthy diet and exercise with this stuff!!! I see results !
customer_reviews.author: Esthefany Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Helped Regulate My Blood Sugar
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t lose any weight taking these. It might have curbed my appetite some, but if it did, I didn’t really notice much. What it DID do, however, was help regulate my blood sugar, which to me is way more important since I’m diabetic. With Glipizide, my sugar runs about 130. When I added the Garcinia, my sugar started running about 90. I wasn’t expecting that effect, but it certainly was a nice surprise. Made the purchase totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Helps curb my appetite
customer_reviews.text: In the 2 weeks I have been using this product I have noticed that my appetite is more easily satisfied, i.e. I feel full after eating a smaller amount of food. I take it about a half hour before either breakfast or lunch. I have more energy during workouts as well. It doesn't make me feel jittery like amphetamine diet pills. I would definitely recommend this product and will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Whitener

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients and the right amount of the actual Cambogia Extract 1400 mg. It shouldn't be higher than this amount. It slightly does help a bit with the appetite control but not to the extend that you'll won't feel hungry. I started noticing slimming down around my tummy area. Will continue taking them and see if I get more improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: Garcinia Cambodia has worked great for me. It works great as an appetite supressent. You only need to take two capsules (1,400mg), once in the morning before breakfast and you'll be good to go for the whole day. With other brands, the directions were to take them before each meal. Because I am busy, I found to this to be very inconvenient and very difficult to remember to do. With just a few adjustments to my diet, and adding this supplement to my diet, I have lost 12lbs in 1 month. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: getting my AC1 down
customer_reviews.text: I have to have a knee replacement and Doctors will not operate because of a high AC1 of 9. I've taken Garcinia Cambogia for a little over 30 days and my AC1 is now below 8. I need to get it below a 7 or less before they will go ahead with the surgery. It seem to be working well in my case. Thanking you. Dan Willett
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does this really work for anyone or it's just me?
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for two weeks now, religiously every morning, two capsules with a cup of water before eating anything (which for me is normally two cups of coffee as breakfast), nothing has happened so far, I have tried to eat less carb and walk more, still no difference in my appetite or weight or whatever supposed to happen! I will continue taking them and will update my review if I see anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Azin Akbari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has helped and continues to help lose weight. 34lbs since last August
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!!!!  7 pounds in 5 weeks and still going down.
customer_reviews.text: I am 66 years old and losing weight is very difficult at this age...............until I started taking this product. No diet. Just eating less because my appetite has adjusted way down. Not sure if it is the product but I seem to be hungry for better food. I actually had a ruptured rotator cuff surgery 5 weeks ago and started taking this because I temporarily cannot do the pilates and yoga I normally do and I lost 7 pounds anyway. Pretty amazing. So grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Colette C. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm on day 5 and I'm pretty pleased with it. I've noticed that I'm not snacking nearly as much throughout the day and I feel full faster. I like that you only have to take it once a day, unlike some of the others that require you to take multiple times per day. It also doesn't have a horrible after taste like some of the other Garcinia Cambogia pills I've taken.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Included with a 15min work-out (3x a week) GREAT RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and had great results. about 9mos ago I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism and it has caused me to gain about 20lbs. so I decided to give this product another try. it's been about a month and I've lost about 10-14lbs. I absolutely love this product. of course I'm mindful of what I eat and drink but i wouldnt have gotten the results i have without including a 15min work-out, minimum of 3 times a week. (recommended for better results). I would recommend this product(brand) to anyone in need of something different that actually works
customer_reviews.author: Cat call

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well for my specific needs...
customer_reviews.text: Comparing the days I take it and days I don't, there's definitely a noticeable difference in my energy levels and appetite. I don't take it for weight loss -- I just use it to keep from feeling like I'm starving to death during extra-long workdays when I'm unable to stop and eat. So for my particular needs, it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mazon

customer_reviews.title: This really helps curb hunger
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything from pruvit keytones to beach body and other stuff and taking these two little pills each morning is the only thing that made a difference. My hunger is suppressed and I feel great. No side effects or running to the rest room. I suggest taking it after coffee or an hour before your first meal. You will see a difference in hunger. Remember to drink lots of water to stay full and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: liz zygmuntowicz

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: Over a period of about 4 months I have become much more lean by using this product. I eat relatively healthy, lift weights and bike ride a lot but still couldn’t shed the extra fat around my belly area. This product helped me do that without changing much else. I’ve definitely lost fat but not necessarily mass. This was the missing piece to my regiment to help get the Body I want for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Kazmierczak

customer_reviews.title: Worked RIGHT away
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday and took it yesterday. The very first time I took it I was skeptic about it working, and working on the first day of me taking it nonetheless. To my surprise, a few hours after taking it, I felt extremely full, and for the rest of the day it felt like I had forgotten food even existed. That’s a MIRACLE coming from me, as I have a problem with constantly overeating and thinking about food 24/7! I’m gonna see how my body reacts for the next few weeks and come back and add to my review
customer_reviews.author: Juji

customer_reviews.title: Appetit Suppressant
customer_reviews.text: I notice a difference in my appetit when ever I take these. I can't tell you for certain if they would make you lose weight, but I can tell you they can help with controlling your appetite. It makes you feel less hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no discomfort
customer_reviews.text: So I am loving this product!! I have tried other fat inhibitors in the past and they are always really harsh on my body. I have a sensitive stomach and I would usually get really sharp pains or have to just take half of the recommended dose. But PLEASANTLY to my surprise this does NOT cause any discomfort! I can see my stomach does not seem as bloated either. I even try to take some right before bed and had no problems sleeping and don’t wake me up in the middle of the night (although it’s recommended you take 25-30mins before a meal, I wanted to still try it while sleeping) Overall great product. Pill size is normal vitamin size.
customer_reviews.author: Constance H.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried these for a week (two pills per day as recommended), but they seem to be helping to control my appetite. It's not so much that I can't eat, but it seems a little easier to turn down a large or second portion at lunch, and afternoon snacking isn't an issue anymore. It just gives me a little extra boost to control my appetite. I don't notice any jittery feelings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I just completed my first bottle, my weight loss goal was 25 lbs and as of today I've lost 22 lbs. It certainly curbs your appetite and I didn't eat the junk food that I would have normally eaten. I'm buying my 2nd bottle and I plan to loose 8 more pounds which won't take long at all. It Really Works, I didn't loose any weight without this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tazzann

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for about a month. I haven't noticed any significant results, I won't mark down the company because of that though, because this is one of the cheapest Garcinia Cambogia supplement available. I will update this review if I experience any positive or negative results in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.... nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I know this supplement has great rating, but, my best guess is that this depends on the user. I was attempting to take it for appetite control and weight loss, however I did not experience either. I took it regularly, for a period of at least one month and... nada!
customer_reviews.author: Upuha

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I find this product effective. I take it when my weight creeps up those 3 to 5 pounds above my ideal. I am not overweight and find I only need to take one pill at mid-day to be less interested in eating non-nutritious food (OK, crackers with butter are my go-to) and get back to my preferred weight relatively quickly. I have noticed no side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Personally i put on weight pretty easily and this helps me keep it off when I slightly fall off the wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Jwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great potency for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garcinia because it had the higher, 95% potency HCA. Most others at this price point have much less, so it’s a great value! I maintained weight while taking it- but if I can get my motivation to work out again I’m sure it would help me lose weight fast.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great to curb hunger and as a secret weight loss tool.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to just take in the morning. My personal trainer recommended I take this 1x per day as an additional tool for faster weight loss. So far it has been a little over 6 weeks and I lost 12 pounds. Now I am on a exercise program and moderated keto diet with plenty of vegetables, slightly lower fat and all natural whole foods plus protein shake with the hardest workout in the day. The difference is the month prior I only lost 4 pounds and it seemed far slower harder to curb hunger. I will continue to take the product. Naturs Craft Garcinia Cambogia is outstanding @SheilaMacShow
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA

customer_reviews.title: Really helping me with my weight loss progress!
customer_reviews.text: I can really see this being that extra little push needed to loss the last bit of weight iv been trying to lose. Iv been on the keto diet for over a year now and have lost 110lbs. Using this has helped me get off the plateau iv hit and and back to continuing losing weight!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Used together with other products!
customer_reviews.text: I think that using this product does take the edge off my hunger. I use it together with chromium and green tea and saffron. When losing weight it’s important to approach it from many angles. I’ll continue to use this product along with the others!
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: Lose weight
customer_reviews.text: This helped me lose 8 lbs in about 3 weeks. It works!
customer_reviews.author: k806

customer_reviews.title: I'm not one to believe all of the claims of ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to believe all of the claims of products that claim to reduce hunger and whatnot, but I have been consistently using this product for quite some time and do feel that it doesn't take a whole lot of food to fill me up. I am very sensitive to supplements, but I don't have any side effects when taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You have to also eat the right diet - REDUCES CRAVINGS!
customer_reviews.text: So, I was using this without changing my diet and nothing was happening. You have to change your diet! It's hard for me because I always go back to bad eating habits through cravings and being hungry so I can't keep up. I decided to change my diet while also using this pill. I cut the amount of carbs I was eating as well as reduced my meal portion size. It helps tremendously with cravings! I forgot to take this pill one day and I was craving so much junk! This is definitely worth a try! With diet, I lost 4lbs in one week! NO CRAVINGS!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: **I paid in full for this product** I began taking this product a few times a day and noticed a very large boost in my energy. They are easy to swallow and have a very slight taste, but if you take them with a favored drink then the taste is not noticeable. The only reason that this did not get all 5 stars was that I did not notice any of the weight loss. For me, that was the main reason for taking this supplement, and it was taken alongside of exercise. I am going to continue to take them to boost my energy and hope that the weightloss comes too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chastain

customer_reviews.title: very Effective
customer_reviews.text: This thing is effective if used regularly and under discipline, timing is important that should be taken about 30 min before meal, and also the dosage should be consistent of 2-3 pills.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. R.

customer_reviews.title: Lost weight!
customer_reviews.text: I was taking the other brand which was ok with the outcome. I think this brand works better. The other brand, you take only one pill a day. With this brand, 2 a day. So what I did was 1 in the morning and 1 before going to bed with lots of water. Of course you have to wake up middle of the night for using the restroom, but I keep seeing better result of my weight every morning. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Reducing appetite from first dosage. Mood boosted, I feel in getting more done throughout the day. Seems to be working as advertised, hopefully weight loss will be coming soon as well!
customer_reviews.author: jenh81

customer_reviews.title: Appetite suppressor.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Combined with a healthy diet and exercise plan be prepared to lose as much weight as you would like. You have to follow a strict diet and exercise plan along with taking these pills otherwise you’re just wasting your time. It suppresses your appetite pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Angelito

customer_reviews.title: Appetite suppressant
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for quite some time and shows that it definitely suppress your appetite. I take it in the mornings prior to eating and it really helps in my eating habits, and I have lost 7 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: GolfQueen

customer_reviews.title: Helps metabolism
customer_reviews.text: I honestly believe these capsules helped with my metabolism and losing weight. However, I started getting headaches. It may not have been because of this product but, I stopped taking them as a precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked to curb my appetite.
customer_reviews.text: The product in and of itself doesn't lose the weight for you, but it does an excellent job at curbing my appetite. I've been able to successfully cut back my overeating without hunger pangs or blood sugar issues like I typically deal with when trying to reduce the amount I eat. It has made it a lot easier to make healthy decisions because I don't feel as ravenous. It hasn't caused any nausea like some supplements I've taken. Also, this brand seems more potent than others I've gotten garcinia cambogia in. I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: rogue_robot

customer_reviews.title: Reduced  my  appetite
customer_reviews.text: One week of taking the Garcinia Cambodia. I’ve lost 2.5 pounds. It did reduce my over eating.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: These INCREASE your appetite!!
customer_reviews.text: These pills lowered my blood sugar and as a result spiked my appetite! Have never eaten so much as when I was on these! Only buy if you are looking to GAIN weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It works :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few years back and it worked really well, it controlled my binge eating since I have little appetite now I still eat anything I want and I don’t have time for gym since I’m always busy yet it works amazing ,this definitely something I’d recommend I’m sure you’ll see way faster results working out and eating better. I’m not too over weight or anything but I’ve notice I am gaining some extra lbs so I’ didn’t have to try any other product I did not hesitate and went straight to purchased this product once again :)
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would help curb my appetite since I have a naturally big appetite constantly and I have always found myself mindlessly eating which has made my body goals harder to achieve. After trying this supplement for a couple of days I did notice my appetite was generally reduced. I am happy with this product. The one thing I recommend is making sure you take it every day and try not to forget because I feel that it makes a difference when you do. Overall good product.

product_meta.title: Garcinia Cambogia with 95% HCA Weight Loss Supplement - Best Fast Acting Fat Burner and Natural Carb Blocker Diet Pills - Pure Garcinia Extract Appetite Suppressant for Men & Women
feature_bullets: GARCINIA CAMBOGIA - Garcinia Cambogia extract is one of the world's best weight loss supplements - the perfect way to get rid of stubborn pounds. Burn body fat and get the lean, fit physique you've always wanted with nature's help!

95% HCA CONTENT - Our Garcinia Cambogia diet pills boast 95% HCA, making it far more potent than most other garcinia capsules, tablets, drops, and chewables on the market. Experience optimum weight loss results.

BLOCK CARBS - Hydroxycitric Acid (HCA) works by inhibiting the citrate lyase enzymes that help turn carbs into body fat. This means taking garcinia cambogia may prevent fat gain and support lasting weight loss.

SUPPRESS APPETITE - Control your cravings easily with garcinica cambogia's assistance. It is a natural appetite suppressant that minimizes hunger pangs and improves satiety, making it easier to follow your diet.

FORMULATED IN THE USA - Natures Craft supplements are made with quality and value in mind. Our products are produced by GMP certified facilities in the United States, and we exclusively use non-GMO ingredients to preserve purity and potency.
